mapper.sql: cart_id AS cartId, open_id AS openId, union_id AS unionId, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, delete_time AS deleteTime
mapper.select:
select a.* from _cart_product as a INNER JOIN _cart as b on a.cart_id = b.cart_id INNER JOIN _product as c on a.product_id = c.product_id inner join _product_spec as d on a.product_spec_id = d.product_spec_id left join _activity as e on a.activity_id = e.activity_id left join _activity_product as f on (e.activity_id = f.activity_id and f.product_id = a.product_id and f.product_spec_id = a.product_spec_id)
where a.delete_time is null and b.delete_time is null and c.delete_time is null and d.delete_time is null AND e.delete_time is null AND (e.activity_id = 0 or (e.activity_id > 0 and f.activity_product_id is not null)) and b.union_id = #{unionId} order by a.create_time desc
